title: AUDIO EXCERPT: The Lawdog Files
author: VD
content_html: This excerpt features “Armadillo Love” in its entirety, taken from the hilarious collection of true Texas crime stories by Lawdog. The Lawdog Files are also available in ebook and paperback editions.
content_text:
